PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-14612014-12-12,  ,  TC,  , 
ActTransportation of Dangerous Goods Act, 1992
SubjectRegulations Amending the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (Lithium Metal Batteries, ERAPs and Updates to Schedules)
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS REGULATIONS (LITHIUM METAL BATTERIES, ERAPS AND UPDATES TO SCHEDULES) in order to harmonize with US and international standards, properly identify dangerous goods and reduce regulatory burden on shippers and carriers by clarifying requirements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0306 Publication Date: 2014-12-31
AttachmentsAttachment
